Stripe Terminal Android SDK (v5.1.0)
search in API
external/com.stripe.stripeterminal.external.models/EasyConnectConfiguration

EasyConnectConfiguration

actual sealed interface EasyConnectConfiguration

Configuration for EasyConnect, which simplifies discovering and connecting to a reader for user integrations.

Parameters

discoveryConfiguration

The discovery configuration used to discover readers we want to connect to.

connectionConfiguration

The connection configuration used to connect to the discovered reader.

Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

Inheritors

InternetEasyConnectConfiguration
AppsOnDevicesEasyConnectionConfiguration
TapToPayEasyConnectConfiguration

Configuration for easily connecting from applications running on the reader.

class InternetEasyConnectConfiguration(val discoveryConfiguration: DiscoveryConfiguration.InternetDiscoveryConfiguration, val connectionConfiguration: ConnectionConfiguration.InternetConnectionConfiguration) : EasyConnectConfiguration

EasyConnectConfiguration for internet readers, which simplifies discovery and connecting to internet readers.
